title: The Fox Hollow Encounters: A Historical Fiction Novel
description: A riveting historical fiction novel tells a tale of love, bravery, and sacrifice in the face of oppression and tyranny.In 19th century India, under the oppressive rule of the British, one young man dared to fight for his country's freedom. But when his assassination attempt on the Viceroy fails, he realizes he must take a different approach. Desperate to acquire arms, he seeks German help and gets entangled in a dangerous game of espionage. Meanwhile, his childhood sweetheart is sold as indentured labor to British Guyana. Separated by oceans and continents, their paths diverge as they fight for their own survival.A British officer who will stop at nothing to capture him is hot on his trail. As the young freedom fighter travels to London, he meets and falls in love with a wealthy girl from Maryland. He must navigate dangerous political landscapes to secure his own freedom and fight for the independence of his own people in a time of great upheaval and strife.Will the young freedom fighter ever be able to return to India and help his countrymen gain independence? Or will he be consumed by the cause that has taken over his life? Will his childhood sweetheart be able to find true freedom and reunite with her love? The answers lie within the pages of this captivating novel.
author: Nilish Gupte
